name: Make Game Clicker
description:
A very simple and cynical cyclical idle-clicker adventure.

Now you can experience all the thrills and drama of being a game developer!

TO ANY WHO MIGHT BE PLAYING THIS IN ITS CURRENT STATE: anything and everything is subject to change. The game will save your progress, but don't be too surprised if your save file becomes outdated or corrupt. You can always start over, that should correct any weirdness.
